scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): versão %s (patch)" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): versão %s (minor)" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): versão %s (major)" && git push && git push --tags
